page.title: 08DIPTFORD ACTIVITIES
page.content: There are 15 {Brownies.}Brownies have been going m75 years. Mrs. Campbell is Brown-Owl. The brownies have received some money and have decided to brighten up the Village Hall.They went to a Garden Centre and bought three plant troughs and two plant pots and some seeds and flowers. As well as working the Brownies play games. Most of the games are to do with helping at home or anywhere else.{Guides} is from 1O-14 years girls. This year they are celebrating 75 years of guiding. The guides are doing something called Purpose Patches, which are challenges to test their skills in camping.The {Womens Institute} have 29 members. They meet the 2nd Monday each month in the Village Hall at 7.3O. They hve competitions and coffee mornings to raise money. They have a management Committee with 8 helpers.
